#include<stdio.h>

long long int cal(int n, int j)
{
	long long int mul = 1;
	int k;
	for(k=j+1;k<=n;k++)
	{
		mul *= k;
	}
	return mul;
}

main()
{
	int i,j,t,n;
	long long int sum;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		if(n <= 1)
		{
			printf("0\n");
			continue;
		}
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			sum = 1;
		}
		else{
			sum = -1;
		}
		for(j=n-1;j>=2;j--)
		{
		if(j%2 == 0)
		{
			sum = sum + cal(n,j);	
		}	
		else{
			sum = sum - cal(n,j);
		}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",sum);
		
	}
}
